# Adamantine Breastplate
## Overview
**Aura** no aura (nonmagical); **CL** —

**Slot** armor

**Price** 10,200 gp

**Weight** 30 lbs.

**Description**

This nonmagical breastplate is made of [[Adamantine|adamantine]], giving its wearer damage reduction of 2/—.

**Construction**

**Requirements** None

**Cost** 5,100 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 464
